ratings.comment: Great guy. Great class. Loved everything about it. He really wants to see his students succeed. Highly recommended.

Great teacher- very knowledgeable and eager to help. Class had interesting subjects (the 2nd to last unit is a little rough for some, but not bad) and Mike does a great job explaining everything clearly and taking time to make sure the concepts are understood. He grades pretty tough, but its fair. Overall, excellent, excellent prof. Take his class.

Mike is a great teacher and a great guy. He's really funny and keeps you interested. Real down to earth in touch with college kids. Tough grader but goes over stuff slowly and teaches it really well. Always around if you need help too. Definitely take a class from him if you get a chance before he finishes his graduate degree
He's an awesome TA, though a bit quirky. He can also be a tad strict on policies, but he is always willing to help and seems to really care. He is a tough grader.
